name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward BOYD, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward BOYD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: C. Lee Anderson, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, 2nd Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
402 A.2d 660
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward BOYD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 24, 1979.
Decided June 22, 1979.
C. Lee Anderson, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, 2nd Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
